summary: Active meditation page UI fixes and back button positioning: circular play/pause button, removed double vertical padding on control containers, back button always visible regardless of screen width, and back button sits visually below the header bar (Logged In/Logout or Exploring as Guest) in document flow on larger screens — not via z-index but via proper layout order.

existing_features.title: In ActiveMeditationPage.tsx, apply `rounded-full` to the play/pause button so it renders as a perfect circle. Do not change its existing colors, background, hover effects, sizing, or any other styling.

In ActiveMeditationPage.tsx, remove vertical padding (py-*, pt-*, pb-*, padding-top, padding-bottom) from the parent wrapper containers that hold the volume control input and the time/seek control input, so that the inner input container's own padding is not doubled.

In ActiveMeditationPage.tsx, ensure the back button is always visible on all screen sizes. Remove any responsive hiding classes such as `hidden`, `sm:hidden`, `md:hidden`, `lg:hidden`, or any breakpoint-based display:none rules applied to it.

Fix the back button layout across the app so that on larger screens (before the hamburger menu kicks in), the back button sits visually below the header bar ('Logged In / Logout' or 'Exploring as Guest (Saved Locally) Return to Start') in the normal document flow. The fix must be layout/flow-based — not achieved via z-index. On smaller screens where the hamburger menu is active, the current correct behavior must be preserved.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the play/pause button (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/button[1]) fully circle-shaped by applying rounded-full. Preserve all existing colors, background, hover effects, and sizing.

Remove vertical padding from the two control input wrapper containers (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2] and /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[3]) so that their children's own vertical padding is not doubled.

Make the back button (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/button[3]) always visible regardless of screen width by removing any responsive hiding classes (e.g. hidden, md:hidden, lg:hidden, sm:hidden, or any breakpoint-based display:none rules).

In ActiveMeditationPage.tsx, apply `rounded-full` to the play/pause button so it renders as a perfect circle. Do not change its existing colors, background, hover effects, sizing, or any other styling.

In ActiveMeditationPage.tsx, remove the vertical padding (py-*, pt-*, pb-*, padding-top, padding-bottom) from the parent wrapper containers that hold the volume control input and the time/seek control input, so that padding is not doubled with the inner input container's own padding.

In ActiveMeditationPage.tsx, ensure the back button that navigates to the previous page is always visible on all screen sizes. Remove any responsive hiding classes such as `hidden`, `sm:hidden`, `md:hidden`, `lg:hidden`, or any breakpoint-based display:none rules applied to it. Its behavior and appearance should match the back button on PreMeditationPage and other pages where it is always visible.

Fix back button layout so it sits visually below the header bar ('Logged In / Logout' or 'Exploring as Guest (Saved Locally) Return to Start') in the normal document flow on larger screens. The fix must be layout/flow-based (not z-index). On smaller screens with the hamburger menu, the existing correct behavior should be preserved.
